unnormalised: **Energy & Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Get a Boost!**
normalised: **Energy and Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Get a Boost!**

unnormalised: Good news for folks wanting to go solar! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) just announced a refreshed push for rooftop solar panel subsidies. Think cleaner energy and lower electricity bills, folks!
normalised: Good news for folks wanting to go solar! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (M N R E) just announced a refreshed push for rooftop solar panel subsidies. Think cleaner energy and lower electricity bills, folks!

unnormalised: Word on the street in Lucknow is that the Uttar Pradesh government is topping up the central subsidy with their own incentive, making it even more attractive for homeowners.
normalised: Word on the street in Lucknow is that the Uttar Pradesh government is topping up the central subsidy with their own incentive, making it even more attractive for homeowners.

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma from IIT-Kanpur says this is a smart move. "Reduced upfront costs make solar adoption much easier, especially for middle-class families."
normalised: Doctor Sharma from I I T-Kanpur says this is a smart move. "Reduced upfront costs make solar adoption much easier, especially for middle-class families."

unnormalised: Essentially, you could get a significant discount on installing those panels on your chhat. We're talking potential savings of thousands of Rs., depending on your system size (measured in sq ft, of course!). Check out the details on the MNRE website or with your local DISCOM.
normalised: Essentially, you could get a significant discount on installing those panels on your chhat. We're talking potential savings of thousands of rupees, depending on your system size (measured in square feet, of course!). Check out the details on the M N R E website or with your local D I S C O M.

unnormalised: Rumor has it that projects under 3 kW are getting the best deal. This initiative will definitely help in meeting India's renewable energy targets. Don't delay, tap into the sunshine and reduce your reliance on the grid! This could be as good as that Diwali bonus you were hoping for!
normalised: Rumor has it that projects under three kilowatt are getting the best deal. This initiative will definitely help in meeting India's renewable energy targets. Don't delay, tap into the sunshine and reduce your reliance on the grid! This could be as good as that Diwali bonus you were hoping for!
